content:
There's a question on the CESM bulletin board: https://bb.cgd.ucar.edu/cesm/threads/help-with-python-polar-stereographic-plotting-of-cice-and-pop-data.7319/ -- basically, the user has copied CESM output from cheyenne to a local machine. Reading in 30 years of model output and plotting fields from CAM and CICE is fine but the following error occurs when trying to plot a POP field: link to her screenshot of error

I've invited the user to join Zulip, so I don't know if the conversation will eventually move here or to #python-questions , but if any of you can help with the forum post that would be great!
